about description: You will have unlimited access to all the features of UTasks Pro for the duration of your subscription. Cancel your subscription at any time with no hidden fees!
amount section subtitle: Purchase licenses for the whole team or as a gift
A discount applies when purchasing multiple at once

dictionary: Priority!NEW: Set priorities and status: Mark important tasks and track progress with statuses
Files!NEW: Adding files: Upload and access files directly within the task
Command!NEW: Short commands: Manage tasks directly in the group chat, no mini app required
Avatar!NEW: Private project avatars: Upload and set avatars for personal projects
People: Multiple assignees: Assign lots of people to any task!
Folder: More projects: Create more projects without limitations
Task: Unlimited tasks: Create unlimited tasks in group chats
Clock: Deadlines for tasks: Set deadlines and ensure timely completion
PurpleStack: Project areas: Maintain order and easily find desired projects
Business: Special offer for legal entities: Discounts when buying more than 5 subscriptions at once; we accept direct transfers to our business account. Contact our support for more information.

paid-subsubtitle: You now have access to all features.
payment-disabled message:

Please, try again later.

dictionary.paid: Congartulations! You are now a subscriber!
dictionary.pending: Your payment was accepted and will need some time to be processed.

subscribe success: Payment successful! Your subscription might take a minute to become active.

unsubscribe confirm: Are you sure you don't want to renew your subscription?
